posts.post_content:
The technical grade is due to the scrapbook removal remnants seen on the reverse.  Despite the grade, it has an excellent image.

Please email or PM to discuss further.  Numerous references are available if needed.

The card is SOLD.  Thanks to all who inquired.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="https://www.collectorfocus.com/index.php?/collection/seablaster"]seablaster's collector focus[/URL]
Nice image—good luck with the card!
